# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="37a9e-102">Lesebekreftelser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="37a9e-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="37a9e-103">Å be om en lesebekreftelse eller leveringsbekreftelse for meldingen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="37a9e-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="37a9e-104">Velg tre prikker</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="37a9e-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="37a9e-105">Skriv ruten øverst i meldingen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="37a9e-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="37a9e-106">Velg **Vis Meldingsalternativer**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="37a9e-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="37a9e-107">Merk av for **Be om en lesebekreftelse** eller **Be om en leveringsbekreftelse**, eller begge deler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="37a9e-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="37a9e-108">Hvis du vil velge hvordan Outlook svarer for å lese forespørsler om bekreftelse, kan du gå til</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="37a9e-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="37a9e-109">**Innstillinger for** > **Vis alle innstillinger i Outlook** > **Meldingsbehandling**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="37a9e-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="37a9e-110">Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se [lesebekreftelser på Web-området i Outlook](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="37a9e-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
